from pyspark.sql.functions import *
from pyspark.sql.types import *
lakepath = "abfss://lake@synapselakeapp.dfs.core.windows.net/StackOverflow/"
goldpath = "gold/"
historypath = "raw/History/Parquet/"

tableName = 'Tags'

df = spark.read.load(lakepath+historypath+'/stackoverflow.com-'+tableName+'.parquet', format='parquet')

df.write.format("delta").mode("overwrite").save(lakepath+goldpath+tableName)

spark.sql("CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS SparkDwh.{0} USING DELTA LOCATION '{1}'".format(tableName,lakepath+goldpath+tableName))

tableName = 'Badges'

df = spark.read.load(lakepath+historypath+'/stackoverflow.com-'+tableName+'.parquet', format='parquet')

df_withDate = df.withColumn("Id", df["Id"].cast(LongType()))\
                .withColumn("Class", df["Class"].cast(IntegerType()))\
                .withColumn("DateTime", df["Date"].cast(TimestampType()))\
                .withColumn("UserId", df["UserId"].cast(LongType()))\
                .withColumn("PartitionDate", date_format(df["Date"],"yyyy-MM-dd"))
                
df_withDate.drop("Date")


df_withDate.write.format("delta").partitionBy("PartitionDate").mode("overwrite").save(lakepath+goldpath+tableName)

spark.sql("CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS SparkDwh.{0} USING DELTA LOCATION '{1}'".format(tableName,lakepath+goldpath+tableName))

tableName = 'Comments'

df = spark.read.load(lakepath+historypath+'/stackoverflow.com-'+tableName+'.parquet', format='parquet')

df_withDate = df.withColumn("Id", df["Id"].cast(LongType()))\
                .withColumn("PostId", df["PostId"].cast(LongType()))\
                .withColumn("Score", df["Score"].cast(IntegerType()))\
                .withColumn("UserId", df["UserId"].cast(LongType()))\
                .withColumn("CreationDateTime", df["CreationDate"].cast(TimestampType()))\
                .withColumn("PartitionDate", date_format(df["CreationDate"],"yyyy-MM-dd"))
                
df_withDate.drop("CreationDate")

df_withDate.write.format("delta").partitionBy("PartitionDate").mode("overwrite").save(lakepath+goldpath+tableName)

spark.sql("CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS SparkDwh.{0} USING DELTA LOCATION '{1}'".format(tableName,lakepath+goldpath+tableName))

tableName = 'PostHistory'

df = spark.read.load(lakepath+historypath+'/stackoverflow.com-'+tableName+'.parquet', format='parquet')

df_withDate = df.withColumn("PartitionDate", date_format(df["CreationDate"],"yyyy-MM-dd"))

df_withDate.write.format("delta").partitionBy("PartitionDate").mode("overwrite").save(lakepath+goldpath+tableName)

spark.sql("CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS SparkDwh.{0} USING DELTA LOCATION '{1}'".format(tableName,lakepath+goldpath+tableName))

tableName = 'PostLinks'

df = spark.read.load(lakepath+historypath+'/stackoverflow.com-'+tableName+'.parquet', format='parquet')

df_withDate = df.withColumn("PartitionDate", date_format(df["CreationDate"],"yyyy-MM-dd"))

df_withDate.write.format("delta").partitionBy("PartitionDate").mode("overwrite").save(lakepath+goldpath+tableName)

spark.sql("CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS SparkDwh.{0} USING DELTA LOCATION '{1}'".format(tableName,lakepath+goldpath+tableName))

tableName = 'Posts'

df = spark.read.load(lakepath+historypath+'/stackoverflow.com-'+tableName+'.parquet', format='parquet')

df_withDate = df.withColumn("PartitionDate", date_format(df["CreationDate"],"yyyy-MM-dd"))

df_withDate.write.format("delta").partitionBy("PartitionDate").mode("overwrite").save(lakepath+goldpath+tableName)

spark.sql("CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS SparkDwh.{0} USING DELTA LOCATION '{1}'".format(tableName,lakepath+goldpath+tableName))

tableName = 'Users'

df = spark.read.load(lakepath+historypath+'/stackoverflow.com-'+tableName+'.parquet', format='parquet')

df_withDate = df.withColumn("PartitionDate", date_format(df["CreationDate"],"yyyy-MM-dd"))

df_withDate.write.format("delta").partitionBy("PartitionDate").mode("overwrite").save(lakepath+goldpath+tableName)

spark.sql("CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS SparkDwh.{0} USING DELTA LOCATION '{1}'".format(tableName,lakepath+goldpath+tableName))

tableName = 'Votes'

df = spark.read.load(lakepath+historypath+'/stackoverflow.com-'+tableName+'.parquet', format='parquet')

df_withDate = df.withColumn("PartitionDate", date_format(df["CreationDate"],"yyyy-MM-dd"))

df_withDate.write.format("delta").partitionBy("PartitionDate").mode("overwrite").save(lakepath+goldpath+tableName)

spark.sql("CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS SparkDwh.{0} USING DELTA LOCATION '{1}'".format(tableName,lakepath+goldpath+tableName))
